name: Red Potato Salad With Mustard And Bacon
keywords: bacon, mustard, red potato, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 15 slices bacon, cooked, drained and crumbled
5 teaspoons kosher salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes in a large pot and cover with cold water. Bring to a boil, lower the heat slightly, cover and cook until tender, about 25 minutes. Drain and cool. Cut into quarters and place in a large bowl. Toss with the bacon and scallions.

Whisk the mustard and vinegar together. Slowly whisk in the olive oil. Stir in the salt and pepper. Pour over the potatoes and toss. Mix in the tarragon and parsley. Season with more salt and pepper, if needed. Serve at room temperature.
